name: Real Man
description:
This was a never-published game made for TV Game Jam, on February 2019. The game was made by me and Jeison Pandini, finished about one month after the jam's deadline.

The scene inspiration is linked bellow when Roy and Moss find themselves wanted for armed robbery. The only way to escape is one of the mechanics implemented in the game.

This is was the first time working together and I learn a lot about team time management. I work on code and sound/music of the game, while Jeison made the assets and the awesome animations.
